data.description:
NAKA provides customers with eXtended Reality (XR) spaces for configuring immersive experiences to cover a wide variety of use cases:

Training spaces
Configurable focus-intensive trainings performed in safe, controlled 3d realistic models and environments 

Showroom and retail spaces
Engaging and memorable experiences for retail and customer support processes

Processes and business support spaces
Business-specific connected process for employees, associates and other collaborators (e.g. onboarding, support)

Meetings and collaborative spaces
Multi-user, VoIP-enabled environment for sharing documents, videos, tasks and much more.

changelog.change_log:
Improvements

·      Haptic feedback and sound when moving the ray trace over an interactable surface was added. This helps users to easily understand which are the interactions in a scene.

·      Performance in the open/close menu transition was improved, providing a better overall user experience.

·      It is now possible to define a custom mesh, or remove it, when using the teleport area gadget.

·      It is now possible to rotate your view using the joysticks controller while using the teleport

 

Bug Fixing

·      An issue in the keyboard positioning has been fixed.

·      The inverted appearance of the image of the username when looking for the avatar of another user has been fixed.

·      Other performance tweaks and minor improvements

Added support for Ready Player Me avatars

Performance

Voice synchronization issues have been resolved

Fixed an issue in the blackboard gadget that was preventing to use background images

* Gadgets versioning support

* Adapt to new gadgets setup system

* Videoviewer refreshes the download list when the user leaves

* Fix general synchronization error

* Fix blackboard load from local file

* New AreaTeleport Data

* Fix permissions bug

* Reoder gadgets layers

* Area of AreaTeleport shapes fix

* Fix AreaTeleport Logo load

* Fix webviewer input bug in several instances

* Fix Assistant frames drop bug

* Fix Teleport frames drop bug
